Text:
Thanks for the up.  I am leeching it now, so haven't read (listened) to it yet, but I'm optimistic.  

We know there is a pending demise of this form of file sharing.  I just want to say this:  When I d/l a book that I like well enough to finish, I usually buy it on Amazon to give as a gift.  I am presently listening to The Alchemist, which I got via BT and it is fascinating.  I have already ordered 2 from Amazon to give as Christmas gifts.
